name: Colour & Thing
description:
Specialising in brand and digital communications, we’re a creative agency based in Bristol, inspiring our clients to be brave and imaginative.It’s not about awards or accolades, it’s about furthering our client’s causes, inspiring action, motivating change, creating bigger revenues. The relationships with our clients are more important than anything else, and it’s their success that matters to us. They know what sets them apart.
It’s our job to make sure everyone else does.Everything we do begins with listening. Every client project is a journey from research, through strategy and planning, creative design and content creation, to achieving real outcomes from agile, intelligent and inspiring outputs.
